channel.title: What is the best way to advertise your server?
channel.description:
Hey,
What is the best way to really advertise your server? I've sent it out to a multitude of topsites, does anyone have a list btw?
Anyways, what is the best way to really get your server out there and noticed? We have everything - custom coder, great staff, we just need a larger userbase.
Anyone have tips?

item.title: What is the best way to advertise your server?
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

best way i know to is to post on server status pages and advert on sites

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best way to advertise your server?
